com.schibsted.android.sdk
Class SPiDAuthorizationRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.schibsted.android.sdk.SPiDAuthorizationRequest

public class SPiDAuthorizationRequest
extends java.lang.Object

Contains methods for authorization to SPiD, it handles both WebView and browser redirect.

Constructor Summary

Method Detail

getAuthorizationWebView

protected android.webkit.WebView getAuthorizationWebView(android.content.Context context,
                                                         android.webkit.WebView webView,
                                                         SPiDWebViewClient webViewClient)
                                                  throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
Sets up a WebView with SPiD login

Parameters:
context - Android application context
webView - WebView that should be instantiated to SPiD authorization, creates a new WebView if null
webViewClient - SPiDWebViewClient to be used with WebView, mainly for onPageStarted and onPageFinished
Returns:
The WebView
Throws:
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

getWebView

public android.webkit.WebView getWebView(android.content.Context context,
                                         android.webkit.WebView webView,
                                         java.lang.String url,
                                         SPiDWebViewClient webViewClient)
Sets up a WebView with the provided URL

Parameters:
context - Android application context
webView - WebView that should be instantiated, creates a new WebView if null
url - URL to open
webViewClient - SPiDWebViewClient to be used with WebView, mainly for onPageStarted and onPageFinished
Returns:
The WebView

requestAccessToken

protected void requestAccessToken(java.lang.String code)
Requests access token from SPiD using previously obtained code

Parameters:
code - Refresh token previously from SPiD

refreshAccessToken

public void refreshAccessToken(java.lang.String refreshToken)
Requests a new access token using the refresh token

Parameters:
refreshToken - Refresh token previously received from SPiD

shouldHandleIntent

public static boolean shouldHandleIntent(android.net.Uri data)
Checks if the Intent should be handled by the SPiDAuthorizationRequest

Parameters:
data - Intent data
Returns:
true if Intent should be handled otherwise false

handleIntent

public boolean handleIntent(android.net.Uri data)
Handles incoming Intent if it is sent from SPiD

Parameters:
data - Intent data
Returns:
true if Intent was handled otherwise false

apiLogout

public void apiLogout(SPiDAccessToken token)
Logout from SPiD without redirect to Safari, therefor any existing cookie will not be removed

Parameters:
token - Token to logout
